tasks.title: Update globals.css with Design System Variables
tasks.description: Add all CSS variables from design system including colors, typography, spacing, and border radius to globals.css with proper :root selector setup
tasks.details:
Update globals.css file to include all design system CSS variables:
- Add :root selector with all color variables (foreground-alt, mid-alt, ghost, ghost-foreground, am-* colors)
- Add typography variables (font families, sizes, weights, line heights)
- Add spacing variables (2xs, xs, md, xl, 2xl, 5xl)
- Add border radius variables (sm, lg)
- Ensure proper mapping from Figma variables to CSS custom properties
- Use semantic naming conventions for better maintainability
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all CSS variables are properly defined in :root, test variable usage in browser dev tools, validate color values match Figma specifications, ensure no CSS parsing errors
